Title: Lap Dance
Plot: Acting on Alice's advice, Tina decides to hire a famous lawyer. Dana and Alice struggle to stay away from each other, Ivan gives Kit the cold shoulder, and Jenny decides to have a serious discussion with Robin regarding their relationship.
GuestStars: Luvia Petersen,  Rosette Sharma,  Katie Ritchie,  Debora Cohen,  Shelby Stocks,  Barclay Hope,  Jill Christensen,  Fabrice Grover,  Graeme Duffy,  Francine Cohen,  Dena Robb,  Crystal Lowe,  Kirsten Williamson,
